meanings.definition: To make a loud sucking noise while eating or drinking.
meanings.sent1: The child was slurping his soup at the dinner table.
meanings.sent2: I could hear someone slurping their drink from across the room.
meanings.sent3: The slurping sound coming from the toddler made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The slurping noise of the straw echoed in the empty cup.
meanings.sent5: The slurping sound was so loud, it drowned out the conversation.

meanings.definition: The act of making a loud sucking noise while eating or drinking.
meanings.sent1: The slurping was so annoying during the movie.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't concentrate with all the slurping going on around me.
meanings.sent3: The slurping at the party sounded like a strange orchestra.
meanings.sent4: The slurping of the milkshake was music to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The slurping of the noodles was a symphony of sounds in the restaurant.
